product_overview: The Extended School App is a comprehensive, scalable SaaS platform designed to streamline administration, academic management, communication, and analytics for multi-school environments. It features real-time data synchronization and role-based access to enhance operational efficiency and engagement across all user roles including students, teachers, parents, and admins.
core_goals: Provide a unified platform for managing multi-school and multi-tenant environments with fine-grained role-based permissions.
Offer robust student lifecycle and academic management from admission to alumni status with real-time updates.
Enable seamless communication channels including in-app messaging, email, SMS, and push notifications tailored to user roles.
Support complex administrative functions like finance, transport, hostel management, and library services with integrated analytics and reporting.
Ensure high security and compliance through encryption, two-factor authentication, and backup solutions.
Deliver mobile-first responsive design with offline capabilities and real-time sync to maintain productivity without internet connectivity.
Provide customization and extensibility via module toggling, custom forms, and plugin integrations.
Leverage AI-powered features for performance prediction, risk alerts, timetable optimization, and intelligent reporting.
key_features: Multi-school and multi-tenant support with organization-wide branding and audit logging.
Role-based access control with fine-grained permissions per module for Owners, Admins, Teachers, Students, and Parents.
Student management including admissions, class and stream management, attendance tracking (period and biometric ready), behaviour, discipline, and health records.
Teacher and staff management with profiles, workload, timetables, leave handling, performance reviews, and payroll integration.
Academic management tools for curriculum building, exams, auto-grading, report cards, and GPA calculations.
Learning management with assignments, online tests and quizzes, lesson plans, resource sharing, and student progress analytics.
Parent portal for real-time academic progress, alerts, fee tracking, and communication with teachers and admins.
Multi-channel communication including in-app messaging, SMS and email notifications, announcements, and emergency broadcast mode.
Finance and billing with fee structures, online payments, invoices, discounts, financial reports, and exports.
Sophisticated scheduling and timetable management with clash detection, room allocation, exam scheduling, and calendar sync.
Library, transport, and hostel management modules with tracking, fee management, GPS integration, visitor logs, and meal tracking.
Analytics dashboards for academic, attendance, teacher effectiveness, and financial reports along with custom report builders.
Security features including data encryption, 2FA, session management, disaster recovery, and compliance with GDPR and local laws.
Mobile-first UI design with dedicated Android/iOS apps, offline data capture, and auto-sync on reconnect.
Customization options with module toggling per school, white-labeling, custom forms, a plugin system, and feature flags.
AI-powered capabilities for predictive analytics, attendance risk alerts, timetable optimization, auto-generated insights, and smart chat assistant.
user_flow_summary: Users sign in with role-specific credentials leading to their customized dashboards reflecting real-time data.
Admins configure multi-school settings, assign roles, and manage audit logs and organization branding.
Teachers manage classes, update attendance and behavior records, create and grade assignments, and monitor student progress.
Students access learning materials, submit assignments, and view academic progress and reports through a responsive portal.
Parents monitor multiple childrenâ€™s academic and attendance statuses, receive alerts, manage fees, and communicate with school staff.
Finance teams manage fee structures, process online payments, generate invoices, and produce financial reports.
Scheduling teams generate timetables with clash detection, allocate rooms and labs, and sync calendars with external providers.
Library, transport, and hostel managers track assets, student assignments, attendance, and fees with real-time updates.
Communication across the school community is maintained through messaging, notifications, announcements, and emergency broadcasts.
AI tools analyze data continuously to provide predictions, risk alerts, and automated optimizations enhancing decision-making.
validation_criteria: Role-based access control effectively restricts or permits feature/module access as designed.
Real-time data synchronization updates the UI instantly across all user dashboards and modules.
Audit logs capture all critical user actions and changes with accurate timestamps.
Attendance, behavior tracking, and academic progress data entries reflect accurately for respective students.
Multi-channel notifications and messaging deliver timely and role-appropriate information without failures.
Fee payment processing and financial reports reconcile accurately with transaction records.
Scheduling generates clash-free timetables and correctly reflects room and exam allocations.
Offline mode captures data without connectivity and successfully synchronizes changes upon reconnection.
Security measures including 2FA, encryption, and session management prevent unauthorized access and data breaches.
AI-powered features produce meaningful, actionable insights validated against historical and real-time data.
Customization features correctly enable or disable modules and apply branding and field changes per school.
Mobile applications function responsively and maintain data integrity in offline and online modes.
